name: VR Roofer
summary: Step into the shoes of a sheet metal worker roofer in this immersive VR experience. Explore the exhilarating world of metal craftsmanship as you cut, hammer, and install intricate roof designs. Feel the heat of the sun and the weight of the tools in your hands as you climb to the rooftops, measure dimensions, and secure metal sheets with precision. Gain a new appreciation for the artistry and skill required in this demanding occupation, all within the safety and comfort of virtual reality.
